definition: a large sandwich made of a long crusty roll split lengthwise and filled with meats, cheese, tomato, onion, lettuce, and condiments
details:
noun
- a large sandwich made of a long crusty roll split lengthwise and filled with meats, cheese, tomato, onion, lettuce, and condiments
